module.description: Call Data Record report tools for viewing reports of your calls
module.name: CDR Reports
module.changelog: *15.0.17.18* FREEPBX-23292 Graphql CDR API does not return the Disposition field *15.0.17.17* FREEPBX-23292-graphql-cdr-api-does-not-return-the-disposition-field *15.0.17.16* Packaging of ver 15.0.17.16 *15.0.17.15* SCD-135 call logs not shown if 'Use DPMA' option under endpoint global settings is set to 'No' *15.0.17.14* FREEI-4147 Backup status 'Failure' without reason *15.0.17.13* FREEI-3939 and FREEI-4209 *15.0.17.12* FREEI-3939 Added new input variables to query the CDR data by datetime range with unit test cases *15.0.17.11* FREEI-3939 Refactored gql api to fetch all cdr's and added unit test cases *15.0.17.10* FREEI-3509 D-phone API for call_log takes time to show the entry *15.0.17.9* FREEI-3446 getWidgetListByModule *15.0.17.8* Fixing FREEPBX-8633 Added ", recordingfile, linkedid, peeraccount, *15.0.17.7* FREEI-2660 UCC timestamp mismatch on main CDR module *15.0.17.6* Packaging of ver 15.0.17.6 *15.0.17.5* FREEI-2099 extensions name shown incorrectly. *15.0.17.4* FREEPBX-21776: User Edit > UCP > Call History > CDR Access > not displayed correctly *15.0.17.3* database port missing *15.0.17.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.17.2 *15.0.17.1* FREEI-1782 *15.0.17* FREEPBX-21178 CDR Restore timeout *15.0.16* FREEPBX-21063 Misuse of shell builtins *15.0.15* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.14* Fixed FREEPBX-20444: removed $tmpfiledir from processLegacy() *15.0.13* Fixing FREEPBX-20172 *15.0.12* FREEPBX-19882 *15.0.11* Fixing FREEI-427 Call history on UCP not showing correctly issue *15.0.10* FREEI-435 *15.0.9* backup and restore *15.0.8* Bugfix/FREEPBX-18883 *15.0.7* FREEPBX-18954 fallback to AMPDBHOST *15.0.6* Packaging of ver 15.0.6 *15.0.5* Fixing FREEPBX-18783 sql exception issue *15.0.4* Feature/FREEPBX-18632 *15.0.3* New Backup and Restore for 15 Legacy *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Backup 15.
